group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Institutional review board (IRB) approval was obtained at the Osaka University and Tohoku University prior to implementation of this study.This survey was conducted using a self-administered questionnaire on the Internet. Only participants who consented to participate in this survey answered the questionnaire.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
